name: Tilted (LootBndt)
description:
Tilted

Trapped inside the machine, fight an endless horde as they topple from above!

Difficulty will increase over time!

Keeping ideas small and simple with this, thanks for having a look! :D

Controls -

Arrow keys - Move and shoot

Enter - Start game

F - Fullscreen

R - Restart

Esc - Cancel fullscreen / Quit
